system.availability: Hired to perform some appropriate act of violence, such as attacking a rival gang, raiding a precinct to free a prisoner, instigating a riot, providing backup in a fight, providing safe passage through a dangerous area, and so on. Have plentiful members that are somewhat expendable, albiet not for free. Success based on Requisition Test and task difficulty (EG: Attacking a similar gang stronghold would be -10, attacking an Arbites Fortress-Precinct would be -60).
system.cost: Found on Hive Worlds Only. Groups of gangers outfitted with violent weapons and personalities. Require payment and a promise of something they gain out of the act.
